name: Conjoined (conjoined)
description:
Game

This is a combat adventure game filled with challenging puzzles. You must gather a key from a gigantic killer robot called a hattertron; programmed by Odious Keith. Destroying it will drop a key allowing you to enter Odious Keith's castle.

Story

Our story begins when Odious Keith overcomes with grief for his dead twin brother and started experimenting with a mutated gene that can conjoined people together. Odious Keith's first experiment is on two twins Jonnie and Connie. After they have been conjoined they are forced to work together to reach a common goal, which is to put an end to Odious Keith's madness and free all his experiments from their chains.

------------------------------ Controls ----------------------------

                                Use Wasd to move

                                         Shift to run  

                                     Spaces to jump     

                          Left click to scissor attack

                            Right click to bat attack

                                             f to heal

                     Middle mouse to zoom in and out

                         Middle mouse click to dash

                                 c to spin attack
